my_trees_description: This is a list of your contributions to the Trillion Tree Campaign, this contains trees you have planted, donated, or claimed.
no_contributions: Welcome to your forest. Here you can see all the trees you have planted and registered with your hands and all the trees you have donated. Show the world your forest!
my_trees_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete these trees?
deletion_warning_summary_contribution: You are about to delete some trees you have registered as planted.
delete_my_trees_action: This action will permanently delete this contribution.
here_list_of_trees_planted: Hereâ€™s list of trees {{firstname}} has planted
contributors_description: This tree counter is supported by following members. Trees planted by contributors are aggregate to this total Tree Count of this user.
